about_the_game:
What would you do if the one you love the most suddenly disappeared?
How far would you be willing to go to save her?
What would be your limit?

Disappeared is a horror game, in a semi-open world, based on exploration and progression.

Your wife disappears in the middle of a camp. You need to understand what is happening, and find a way to save her.

UNEXPLAINED EVENTS

  • Semi-open world, you are free to explore.

  • Strange and mysterious day and night cycle.

  • Time anomalies disturb the natural cycle of the hours. - Variable climates and environments: rain, storms, fog, and several other supernatural climate changes

A RICH STORY DRIVES THE EVENTS

  • A plot explains the game facts.

  • A balanced story, without too much verbosity (long texts).

  • You will not be 'led by hand' and will have to read between the lines to understand the game's lore.

EXPLORE AND INVESTIGATE

  • Clues will make you progress in solving the mysteries.

  • Find passages of history that will gradually help you understand the plot.

  • Find various objects, each one with its role in the game's progression.

  • Central puzzles that will unlock the regions of the semi-open world.

TENSION AND ENEMIES

  • You will be in a classic horror environment, full of psychological tension.

  • The enemies are powerful. Avoiding them is the best way to proceed.

  • There are limited ways to face enemies, but the necessary resources are scarce.

  • Different enemies react to you: some can see you; others can hear you; others can sense your presence at a certain distance.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3 multi-core CPU or above
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 (or equivalent graphic cards, vulkan compliant)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Disappeared is a horror game, whose central aspect is exploration and stealth progression. You are Axel, camping with your wife, Deb, in a forest. She suddenly disappears. You need to make sense of what happened and find a way to save her, while being attacked and chased by powerful beings.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese
